_meta.source: Researched from Egypt tourism and cruise port guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Safaga port, gateway to Luxor and Valley of the Kings

transit_routes.name: Coach to Luxor
transit_routes.note: Most common way to reach Luxor. Book ship excursion for convenience.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Hurghada
transit_routes.note: For beach resorts and diving if not going to Luxor.

featured_experiences.name: Luxor & Valley of the Kings
featured_experiences.note: Ancient Thebes with pharaonic tombs. Long but unforgettable day trip.

featured_experiences.name: Red Sea Beach Day
featured_experiences.note: Alternative to Luxor for those seeking relaxation.

featured_experiences.name: Desert Safari
featured_experiences.note: Explore the desert landscape around Safaga.
